title: Letting You Go
description: From the moment I first kissed her, she was mine. I met Luna Marshall when I was seventeen.She was a force of nature that I wasn't ready for.She was gravity and I was caught in her pull—Powerless while she held me in a world I was desperate to escape.They say you never forget your first love.I believe they're right.I'll always remember the sound of her laughter.The way she whispered my name when I touched her, and the taste of her on my lips.I'll remember everything.Letting You Go is book 1. The story continues and concludes with book 2 When You Were Mine.
author: Jordan Marie
